short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Website SEO Checker - analyze the semantics and on-page SEO of the pages of your site and the site of a competitor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plerdy Website SEO Checker – a powerful tool to help you quickly check and improve your site’s SEO, making sure it performs well in search engines. 📈

Why should you install it? If you need a fast way to understand your website’s SEO health, Website SEO Checker gives you instant access to all the main details. Just one click on the icon, and you’re ready to go!

What does Website SEO Checker do?
With this extension, you can:
✅ Instantly see your site’s key SEO metrics like title, description, H1 tags, and more.
✅ Count the number of H tags, JavaScript files, and "a" tags, plus check for comments in the page’s code.
✅ Easily spot and analyze your content’s top-used words, readability, stop words, and unique words, so you know if your main keywords are in place and if the text is engaging.

Extra features: Sign in to the full Plerdy platform, and Website SEO Checker opens up even more 
tools:
✅ Analyze all pages at once – no waiting.
✅ Filter SEO errors by device type (desktop, mobile, tablet).
✅ Sort pages by error type, like “Important Issues” or “Minor Issues.”
✅ Check page SEO metrics over time with a quick “Before and After” view.
✅ Connect Google Search Console to see keyword clicks and impressions for every page.

Get the Plerdy Website SEO Checker:
✅ Free Chrome extension for instant SEO insights
✅ Extra features when you sign up at Plerdy platform – https://a.plerdy.com/auth/register
Want to know more about data privacy? Check out Plerdy’s privacy policy https://www.plerdy.com/privacy-policy/

Learn all about Plerdy and Website SEO Checker on Plerdy’s website https://www.plerdy.com/
